name: ORS National HDC Releases
description: HDC0011 v1.0 This report has been designed specifically for the Prison & Probation Analytical Services team in order to assist with a government enquiry into the state of HDC releases currently accross the prison estate.

dataset.name: Offenders
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.DESCRIPTION, DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, AT_SENT_ORDERS.COURT_DATE, Case when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS In ('14FTR_ORA','14FTRHDC_ORA','CUR_ORA','FTR/08','FTR_HDC','FTR_HDC_ORA','FTR_ORA','FTR_SCH15','FTRSCH15_ORA','HDR_ORA','LR','LR_ALP','LR_ALP_LASPO','LR_DLP','LR_DPP','LR_EPP','LR_ES','LR_HDC','LR_IPP','LR_LASPO_AR','LR_LASPO_DR','LR_LIFE','LR_MLP','LR_ORA','LR_SEC236A','LR_SEC91_ORA','LR_YOI','LR_YOI_ORA') then 'Recall' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE = '0' then 'Dead' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE = '1' then 'Indeterminate Sentence' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE in ('2','3') then 'Sentenced' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE in ('4','5','6','7') then 'Convicted Unsentenced' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE in ('9','10') or AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS = 'CIV_RMD' then 'Civil Prisoners' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE in ('8','11') then 'Immigration Detainees' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.BAND_CODE in ('12','13','14') then 'Remand' when AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS = 'UNKNOWN' then 'Unknown' else 'Other' end, AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.DESCRIPTION, nvl(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE,AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE), nvl(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE,AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, OMS_OWNER.MOVEMENT_REASONS AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, ( SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE  Else null End as Last_Rel_Date , EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID=(SELECT max(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) ) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, OMS_OWNER.ORDERS AT_SENT_ORDERS, ( --SELECT  -- max(MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS MOVEMENT_SEQ --FROM -- OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS --GROUP BY -- OFFENDER_BOOK_ID SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_SEQ, MAX(MOVEMENT_TIME) AS MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_SEQ ) DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE ( DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID and DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.MOVEMENT_SEQ=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_SEQ ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE=AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_TYPE and AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE=AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+)=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+)=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS='Y' or AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS is null ) AND ( AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE(+)=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE ) AND ( AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN(+)=('MOVE_TYPE') ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID=AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS(+)=AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS ) AND ( AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE='INST' ) AND ( AT_SENT_ORDERS.ORDER_ID=AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.ORDER_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CATEGORY <> 'LICENCE' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CALC_TYPE NOT LIKE '%AGG%' ) AND ( trunc(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) BETWEEN '12-12-2017 00:00:00' AND '19-12-2017 00:00:00' AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE IN ( 'OUT' ) AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION IN ( 'Release' ) AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE IN ( 'HR','HD','HE','HU' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') or 'All' in ('All') ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID=(SELECT max(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) ) AND ( DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID and DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.MOVEMENT_SEQ=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_SEQ ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: HDC
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.DESCRIPTION, nvl(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCED_OVERRIDED_DATE,AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCED_CALCULATED_DATE), AT_HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS.REFERRAL_TO, AT_HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS.REFERRAL_DATE, AT_HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS.RECEIVED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS.APPROVAL_STATUS, AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS.DECISION_DATE, nvl(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE,AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_CALCULATED_DATE), AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS.REVIEW_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, OMS_OWNER.HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS AT_HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CURFEWS AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS, ( --SELECT  -- max(MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS MOVEMENT_SEQ --FROM -- OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS --GROUP BY -- OFFENDER_BOOK_ID SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_SEQ, MAX(MOVEMENT_TIME) AS MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_SEQ ) DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT WHERE ( DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID and DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.MOVEMENT_SEQ=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_SEQ ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) and AT_OFFENDER_CURFEWS.OFFENDER_CURFEW_ID=AT_HDC_REQUEST_REFERRALS.OFFENDER_CURFEW_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE(+)=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE ) AND ( AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN(+)=('MOVE_TYPE') ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID=AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE='INST' ) AND ( trunc(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) BETWEEN '12-12-2017 00:00:00' AND '19-12-2017 00:00:00' AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE IN ( 'OUT' ) AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION IN ( 'Release' ) AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE IN ( 'HR','HD','HE','HU' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') or 'All' in ('All') ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID=(SELECT max(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) ) AND ( DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID and DT_LATEST_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENT.MOVEMENT_SEQ=AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_SEQ ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (HDC_REFERRAL_TO IN ('GOVERNOR') AND HDC_REVIEW_FLAG <> 'Y'))
